    List<PointPartitioner.Bounds>
    findCells(int cellsPerDimension, Collection<algorithms.util.PairInt> points)
    find cells of roughly similar area across points by dividing the x and y into cellsPerDimension for the larger range axis, then adjusting the other to keep same cell size where possible.

  • Method Details

    • randomSubsets

      public List<algorithms.util.PairIntArray> randomSubsets(algorithms.util.PairIntArray points, int subsetSize)
      make subsets of size subsetSize out of points by randomly distributing the points into the subsets. Note that the last subset will be smaller than subsetSize if (points.getN() % subsetSize) != 0.
      Parameters:
      points -
      subsetSize -
      Returns:

    • findCells

      public List<PointPartitioner.Bounds> findCells(int cellsPerDimension, Collection<algorithms.util.PairInt> points)
      find cells of roughly similar area across points by dividing the x and y into cellsPerDimension for the larger range axis, then adjusting the other to keep same cell size where possible.
      Parameters:
      cellsPerDimension -
      points -
      Returns:
